about_the_game:
Eunice Park and Suzy Karlson are probably the best college beach volleyball team in all of the continental USA and have been touted to win the coveted ABVA (American Beach Volleyball Association) Gold Cup at the finals being held in Honolulu next month.

Thing is, something has gotten to the duo and their practise sessions have been less than smooth. To alleviate this problem their manager, Natalia, seeks the help of a legendary sports guru that lives in a remote island in the Caribbean.

The three set off for this Tropical Paradise to see if they can seek help from this sports guru to help Eunice and Suzy get their groove back so they can confidently fly to Hawaii to win the ABVA Gold Cup.

Features
  • Soothing Reggae and Latin Jazz Background music
  • Many CGs
  • Multiple Endings

content_descriptors.notes: King of Volleyball has romantic relationships between women. The protagonist is a therapist and a lot of issues of same-gender relationships are deeply discussed. Protagonist and other characters frequently consume alcohol. Some mild sexual references are also used. All characters are over 18 years of age. There is nudity and nude kissing present in the game.

detailed_description:
Buzz


About the Game

Eunice Park and Suzy Karlson are probably the best college beach volleyball team in all of the continental USA and have been touted to win the coveted ABVA (American Beach Volleyball Association) Gold Cup at the finals being held in Honolulu next month.

Thing is, something has gotten to the duo and their practise sessions have been less than smooth. To alleviate this problem their manager, Natalia, seeks the help of a legendary sports guru that lives in a remote island in the Caribbean.

The three set off for this Tropical Paradise to see if they can seek help from this sports guru to help Eunice and Suzy get their groove back so they can confidently fly to Hawaii to win the ABVA Gold Cup.

Features
  • Soothing Reggae and Latin Jazz Background music
  • Many CGs
  • Multiple Endings

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: King of Volleyball

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista or higher
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: King of Volleyball is a romantic comedy yuri dating sim set in the gorgeous US Virgin Islands. Play as Kiera Marley, a retired pro soccer player turned sports consultant, as she meet some young beach volleyball players who are in desperate need of her help and advice.
